Course Content: Essentials of M&S, M&S Terminology, Systems Modeling, Discrete Event Simulation, Continuous Simulation, Agent Based M&S, Model Verification and Validation. Simulation Based Acquisition, 3D Graphical Modeling, Virtual Reality, Augmented Reality, Games and Serious Games, Human Factor, Human Cognitive and Behavior Modeling, Human Computer Interaction, Simulation Standards, Professionals Ethics for Simulationists, Simulation and Training and M&S Technologies and Application.
